title: CDNetworks Selects Soha Systems to Power Enterprise Application Security (EAS)
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 4:00 AM   Soha Systems 
SUNNYVALE, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/21/15 -- Soha Systems , the innovator of Secure Application Delivery as a Service, today announced the company has signed a strategic partnership with CDNetworks , a global content delivery network (CDN) provider. Under the terms of the agreement , CDNetworks has integrated Soha Cloud into its Enterprise Application Security (EAS) service . By leveraging Soha Cloud as the core EAS security foundation, CDNetworks is delivering a unique service to their customer that protects applications and data while providing a fast, efficient user experience. 
"Our customers require reliable, secure and fast access to internal applications deployed across private and public cloud environments," said John Kang, vice president of business development for CDNetworks. "With Soha Cloud helping to power the EAS Cloud, enterprises will now be able to provide secure application access to their user base without deploying complex application delivery and access equipment, and without making massive changes to their application infrastructure. Our alliance with Soha Systems enhances our web scale acceleration and application delivery service offerings by providing a strong security footprint along with a rich complement of high availability, identity, visibility and reporting capabilities." 
Soha Cloud is the industry's only secure application access solution based on a cloud DMZ service, providing a more secure model for user access to enterprise applications deployed in public and private clouds. Soha Cloud also provides a variety of application delivery and identity related features that are critical to securing enterprise applications against different types of attacks. Unlike existing network security appliances and access methods, Soha Cloud enables companies to lock down all inbound access to their network and cloud infrastructure while isolating access to specific applications. Soha Cloud delivers better security, a simpler deployment, and lower cost than existing solutions. 
"This strategic alliance with CDNetworks highlights the unique value that Soha Cloud delivers to enterprises," said Haseeb Budhani, CEO and co-founder of Soha Systems. "By leveraging Soha Cloud as the security foundation of their EAS service offering, CDNetworks has reasserted its commitment to solving critical enterprise IT challenges, and has achieved a significant advantage over its competitors." 
About Soha Systems Soha Systems is the innovator of Secure Application Delivery-as-a-Service for enterprises and SaaS providers. Our service, Soha Cloud, creates an air gap between the user organization's infrastructure and the Internet, reducing the attack surface to zero and making applications invisible to the public. Through Soha Cloud, authenticated users are granted micro-granular access to specific applications. For more information, visit http://www.soha.io and join the conversation on Twitter @sohasystems . 
About CDNetworks CDNetworks is a global content delivery network (CDN) with fully integrated Cloud Security DDoS protection and web application firewall. Our mission is to transform the Internet into a secure, reliable, scalable, and high-performing Application Delivery Network. CDNetworks accelerates more than 40,000 websites and cloud services over a network of 160 global PoPs in established and emerging markets including China and Russia. We have been serving enterprise customers for 15 years across industries such as gaming, finance, ecommerce, high tech, manufacturing, and media. CDNetworks offices are located in the U.S., UK, South Korea, China, Japan, and Singapore. For more information, please visit: http://www.cdnetworks.com Contact:
